mapper.select: select warehouse_stock_id, sku_id, ws.warehouse_id, w.name as warehouseName, stock_quantity, stock_unit_price_without_tax, remark, storage_place_id, initial_stock_quantity, initial_stock_unit_price from w_warehouse_stock as ws join w_warehouse as w on ws.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id where ws.sku_id = #{id}

select warehouse_stock_id, sku_id, ws.warehouse_id, w.name as warehouseName, stock_quantity, stock_unit_price_without_tax, remark, storage_place_id, initial_stock_quantity, initial_stock_unit_price from w_warehouse_stock as ws join w_warehouse as w on ws.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id where ws.sku_id = #{sku} and ws.warehouse_id = #{warehouse}

select warehouse_stock_id, sku_id, warehouse_id, stock_quantity, stock_unit_price_without_tax, remark, storage_place_id, initial_stock_quantity, initial_stock_unit_price from w_warehouse_stock where warehouse_stock_id = #{warehouseStockID}
